summary: Completed comprehensive mobile navigation and role-based access control testing for MUFE Group 4 User Research + Persona Generator. Tested all features on both desktop (1920x1080) and mobile (390x844) viewports. Overall success rate: 97.5% (39/40 tests passed). All critical features working correctly including two-level navigation, z-index stacking, horizontal scrolling, route protection, and responsive design.

ui_bugs.issue: Overlay click to close sidebar fails because sidebar intercepts pointer events
ui_bugs.workaround: Users can click burger menu again to close sidebar
ui_bugs.impact: Minor UX issue - does not break core functionality

Mobile Navigation - Top tabs horizontal scrolling enabled (scrollWidth:574, clientWidth:366)

action_item_for_main_agent: Optional: Fix sidebar overlay click functionality. The overlay exists but sidebar intercepts pointer events. Consider adding pointer-events-none to sidebar when overlay is clicked, or use force:true in the click handler. This is a LOW priority issue as users can still close sidebar by clicking burger menu.
